title: Looking for ranked duo (Silver+)
body:
I'm on quite frequently almost every day, and just want some people who I can try to climb silver with and have some fun while we're at it :D
I main mid - adc - support

replies.body:
Hey man,

I am already in your friend list. We played together before.
I main top and play usually in the morning (6-8am - ish). Not every mornings though.
If you can be online at that hour, we can do some morning slaughters.

I wont play at night since someone uses torrent at that time = heavy lag.

http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=ronystark
